newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Santa Cruz Operation.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Santa Cruz Operation.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist downgraded Santa Cruz Operation Inc to hold from buy, the analyst's office confirmed.
-- analyst Chris Galvin was not immediately available to provide further details.

-- Santa Cruz said Tuesday it expects its second quarter earnings to be below last year's results. The company said its second quarter revenues were affected by weak sales in Europe. Higher spending on new projects also reduced earnings, Santa Cruz said.

-- In a research report, H&Q said Santa Cruz Operation's EPS forecast of $0.02 and $0.05 is below H&Q's estimate of $0.13/shr and the revenue forecast of $53 to $55 million is below its estimate of $58 million.
-- H&Q cut FY97 estimates to $0.40/shr from $0.55/shr.
